Biologically, it is an offshoot of the unagi, and it often acts in symbiosis with larger creatures.<br>As to why they appear in [[Enkanomiya]], it may be that the [[Bathysmal Vishaps]], rays, or perhaps even the ancient [[Orobashi|Great Serpent]] brought them to this strange land.

'''Deep Sea Unagi''' is a type of [[Unagi]] that can be found in the wild in [[Enkanomiya]]. It normally has its upper body sticking out of the water, but will quickly hide if startled.

==Drops==
{{Card|Eel Meat|1}}

==Locations==
Deep Sea Unagi can be found exclusively in Enkanomiya.

See the '''[https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html?lang=en-us#/map/7?shown_types=339 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
